markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sealed Poppet](/Feats.aspx?ID=3348) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 64</row>

</column>

---

You've reinforced your interior parts with sealant or other flame-retardant materials, protecting you from fire. You no longer have the weakness to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) from the flammable ability.

**Special** You can't take this feat if you're a [stuffed poppet](/Heritages.aspx?ID=189).
name: Sealed Poppet
